unnormalised: Saw the India vs. Pakistan cricket match yesterday! What a nail-biter! India scored 266/10 in 49.2 overs. Pakistan was all out for just 200 runs. Bumrah took 4 wickets for only 30 runs. Hardik Pandya scored a crucial 87 runs. Really felt the pressure, especially in the last 5 overs!
normalised: Saw the India versus Pakistan cricket match yesterday! What a nail biter! India scored two hundred and sixty six divided by ten in forty nine point two overs. Pakistan was all out for just two hundred runs. Bumrah took four wickets for only thirty runs. Hardik Pandya scored a crucial eighty seven runs. Really felt the pressure, especially in the last five overs!
